data.title: Overview – Stratford – Newham Council
data.text:
In the Stratford and West Ham neighbourhood we are bringing one of the town centre’s landmark buildings back into use as a hub for creative enterprise, and transforming cycling connections to Forest Gate and Manor Park.

The Stratford and West Ham neighbourhood is one of Newham’s 8 Community Neighbourhoods. Details about the neighbourhood, including a map of the area, some census data and information on the People Powered Places programme in the area can be found in the Stratford & West Ham Community Neighbourhood booklet (PDF).

There are a number of neighbourhood investment projects taking place in Stratford and West Ham, delivering community assets, making healthy and safe connections and improving vibrant streets. On the following pages you can find details about the projects including descriptions, objectives, timelines and ways to get involved.
